author: Lex Luthor
testimonial: I initially met HostingKite via Google. So I searched for selling hosting in Indonesia, and then I found HostingKite. I started trying it well, then I always use HostingKite until now. HostingKite is the best domain and hosting.

author: Bruce Wayne
testimonial: As long as I bought a domain or hosting at HostingKite, I haven't encountered any significant problems. Sometimes, if someone asks me to build a website, I suggest going to HostingKite to make it fast, concise, and easy.

author: Tony Stark
testimonial: I used to know HostingKite from friends. Previously, my new friend HostingKite said that he already used SSD in his hosting. After we tried it, problems rarely happened. Since then I have always used HostingKite.
